alert.note: Alert for Accomack; Northampton (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: High Surf Advisory issued February 12 at 3:24PM EST until February 13 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM EST MONDAY... * WHAT...Large breaking waves of 7 to 9 feet in the surf zone. * WHERE...In Maryland, the Atlantic beaches including Ocean City. In Virginia, the barrier islands of Accomack and Northampton Counties. * WHEN...Until 7 AM EST Monday. * IMPACTS...Dangerous swimming and surfing conditions and localized beach erosion. Time of high total tides are approximate to the nearest hour. OCEAN CITY INLET MD MLLW CATEGORIES - MINOR 4.0 FT, MODERATE 5.0 FT, MAJOR 6.0 FT MHHW CATEGORIES - MINOR 1.5 FT, MODERATE 2.5 FT, MAJOR 3.5 FT TOTAL TOTAL DEPARTURE DAY/TIME TIDE TIDE FROM NORM WAVES FLOOD FT MLLW FT MHHW FT FT IMPACT -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 13/01 AM 3.8 1.3 2.1 1 NONE 13/12 PM 2.9 0.4 1.6 1 NONE 14/01 AM 2.6 0.1 0.9 1 NONE 14/01 PM 2.1 -0.4 0.8 1 NONE 15/03 AM 2.7 0.2 0.8 1 NONE SAXIS VA MLLW CATEGORIES - info.instruction: Inexperienced swimmers should remain out of the water due to dangerous surf conditions.
